DOC.brief_summary: To determine the impact of Neoadjuvant chemotherapy on surgical debulking rate, overall and disease-free survival and quality of life (QOL) in patients with advanced EOC.
DOC.brief_title: Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy in Advanced Epithelial Ovarian Cancer (EOC): A Phase III Randomized Study
DOC.criteria: Age:20 to 65 years Epithelial ovarian carcinoma Stage IIIc & IV (pleural effusion only) ECOG PS 02 Cytology/biopsy positive patients Good compliance Previously untreated patients Any medical contraindication of surgery Psychiatric illness Cardiac, liver or renal dysfunction
